root: ^Some high schoolers were secretly smoking in the toilet. They offered me a drag. What should I do?
^Refuse under the excuse that I only smoke expensive cigarettes
^Refuse, cuz I know that smoking is very bad for my health

res1: ^I had a bad cough and threw up. Everybody's laughing at me now
^Some high schoolers were secretly smoking in the toilet. They offered me a drag. I accepted but got sick and threw up. Everybody's laughing at me now.
res2: ^I will have to somehow prove my words now. Luckily, Dad smokes expensive cigarettes
^Some high schoolers were secretly smoking in the toilet. They offered me a drag. I refused under the excuse that I only smoke expensive cigarettes.
res3: ^The smokers got detention. And I discovered a dead rat in my school bag
^Some high schoolers were secretly smoking in the toilet. They offered me a drag. But I refused and told the teacher on them. As a revenge, they put a dead rat into my school bag.
res4: ^These morons were glad to have more cigarettes for themselves
^Some high schoolers were secretly smoking in the toilet. They offered me a drag, but I refused cuz I know it's very unhealthy.
